channel.title: Prometheus on XKJ Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Prometheus on XKJ Blog

item.title: prometheus basic
item.description: https://zionbackend.functorz.com/actuator/prometheus What’s prometheus? losevka setup scrape metrics: in prometheus: scrape_configs: - job_name: 'spring-boot-application' metrics_path: '/actuator/prometheus' scrape_interval: 15s # This can be adjusted based on our needs static_configs: - targets: ['localhost:8080']
